transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, Haanji Karamveer ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Karamveer ji, Suraj baat kar raha hun, Relationship Manager IndiaMART se.
Executive: Hmm, boliye.
Executive: Ye bataye sir kya dikkat aa rahi hai aapko, Vansh bata raha tha problem aa rahi hai aapko kuch services mein?
Customer: Haan problem hai apne paas mein jab company ka hum ye subscribe plan jab liye.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Us samay humko bataya gaya tha ki aapko hum buyer bhi denge aur supplier bhi denge bolke.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Tab jaake hum buyer to dete hain hum, ye to pata hai hume. Supplier means supplier to aap khud hi hain.
Customer: Nahi hum koi company ka kaam nahi hai apna.
Executive: Ye jo product aapne dilwaye hain sir apne, ye kahaan se hain?
Customer: Wo khud bole ki kon kon products aap jaante hain uska naam bata dijiye hum daal dete hain. Jaise aapki shop ki aapne photo to di hai na hume.
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Aapki shop to hai hi na ek, dukaan hai?
Customer: Haan dukaan hai to chota mota dukaan hai na.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: 5-10 kilometer ke area mein hum thoda bahut supply dete hain.
Executive: To wahi sir jo aapne onboarding ki hogi to aapne ye shop ki photo di hai ki hamare paas ek dukaan hai, hum dealership rahe hain, hum dealer hain. Hai na? To hum ye product deal kar sakte hain agar badi quantity mein aayega to.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Ji bataye.
Customer: Baat clear se us samay hum bole unko ki hum koi company ke dealer nahi hai, dealership le lete hain uske baad mein ye IndiaMART se kaam lenge bolkar ke.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: To us samay bola ki nahi aapko aap dealership rahiyega to apne area mein keval kaam kar paiyega sabhi kshetra mein nahi kar paiyega dealership ka.
Executive: Nahi sir dekhiye aapki onboarding aise hoti to hai nahi. Ki aapki onboarding aise ho jaati hai turant hi aapne payment kar diya hamari production team bhi aapko call hi kiya hoga unhone confirm kiya hoga ki aap kis product mein deal karna chahte hain ki nahi. To aapne yes bola hoga na sir?
Customer: To humko aise hi bola gaya tha first time to wo hum bolenge na sir.
Executive: Sir bilkul aapko bolna to phir wahi keh raha hun aapko first time aisa bola nahi gaya raha hoga sir aapko ye bola gaya raha hoga ki aapko buyer hum IndiaMART se laake dete hain. Aap bhi supply kar rahe ho product aap supply kariye apne level pe jitna aap kar sakte hain.
Customer: Humko IndiaMART kabhi bhi aapko nahi kahega sir ki hum aapko supplier dila ke denge.
Customer: Hum shuru mein bhi bole ki hum koi company ka dealership nahi hai apna.
Executive: Ye product aapne apne apne storage mein rakha hua hai photo mein, muja cement wagera jo bhi aapne rakha hai cemented ke ye kiske hain sir? Iska aap dealership nahi hai to rakhe kaise hain aap?
Customer: Idhar ka local dealer se lete hain.
Executive: Wahi to keh raha hun sir.
Executive: Kahin na kahin aapke beech mein connect to hoga hi hoga.
Executive: Exact issue bataiye sir ye issue to lag hi nahi raha sir aapka.
Customer: Kaise nahi lag raha hai?
Executive: Sir wahi to main puch raha hun aapse.
Customer: Aap keh rahe hain ki aapko bataya gaya tha ki aapko buyer bhi milega aur supplier bhi milega. To buyer to hum aapko de hi rahe hain. Supplier kis cheez ka chahiye?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hum koi company ka kaam nahi hai mera to bulb mein hum nahi na de pa rahe hain maal.
Executive: Ki sir aap bulb mein maal nahi de pa rahe hain main samajh gaya aapne ye jo product add kiya hai phir ye add kyun karwaya hai? Jaise Jindal TMT bar hai, Kamdhenu hai. Hai na? Aapka ACC cement hai, Tata TISCON TMT bar ye aapne add dilwaya kyun hai? Matlab mera kehne ka matlab ye hai.
Customer: Bangur cement aapne dilwaya hai, Dalmia, Dalmia DSP cement aapne dilwaya sir, Dalmia aur Bangur ka aap storage bhi rakha hua hai aapne apni online shop mein, jo aapki shop hai offline usme bhi.
Customer: Nahi hai Bangur ka nahi hai.
Executive: Sir dekho ab aisa to hai nahi kisi ne aapko jabardasti onboarding karke aapse paise le liye honge. Koi to ek process hua hoga na aapke saath aur wo process proper hamara hota hai sir. Ki hum aapse payment lete hain phir aapke product add karte hain usme aap puri sehmati lete hain. Aap agree karte hain phir hum aage process karte hain.
Customer: Hum to bole hum first time baat hua tha jinse baat hua tha unse humara baat kara dijiye hum unko bolte hain nahi bola hai ki.
Executive: Haanji?
Customer: Jo humse call karke jo bola tha ki aapko hum buyer bhi denge supplier denge us vyakti se humko baat kara dijiye nahi bola hai ki. Aise thodi bol rahe hain hum. Haan to abhi aapko problem kya aa rahi hai mujhe wo bataiye aap. Thik hai buyer aapko ja raha hai sir acche buyer aapko ja rahe hain aap portal bhi check kar rahe hain. Waha kya dikkat aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Hum hum nahi na de pa rahe hain maal.
Executive: Kisi ko maal deliver nahi kar pa rahe hain aap? To aap kya chaah rahe hain sir aap mujhe batayenge?
Customer: Haan?
Executive: Kya chaah rahe hain sir aap?
Customer: Abhi mera paisa refund kar dijiye hum dealership le lenge ek wo company ka apne paas kuch paisa punji ho jaaye. Uske baad hum khud karenge humko laga IndiaMART mein kaam jo hai achha hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Lekin lekin uske liye apne paas punji bhi to chahiye.
Executive: Sir ye aapne onboarding se pehle nahi bola tha kisi ko? Socha to hoga hi sir aapne onboarding se pehle jab aapki onboarding nahi hui thi service live nahi hui thi to aapne socha hoga na sir aapka aaj ki date mein catalog bana hai aapki website bani hai aap keh rahe hain hum usko band kar de wo.
Customer: Bole the sir, bol to rahe hain bole the bolke.
Executive: Wahi to main keh raha hun. Us sab chinta karne ka baat nahi hai bas aap humko call kar lijiyega. Sir chinta uski
Executive: Baat ye hai sir baat uski hai ki aapki ek baar website banti hai aapka promotion hota hai aapki live services chalti hain usme mehnat hoti hai aapki bhi plus IndiaMART ki bhi. Hmm. Mehnat zero ho jaati hai na sir aap jo keh rahe hain abhi.
Customer: Mehnat to hoga kahe nahi hoga. Hum bhi pareshan hue tab se pareshan ho rahe hain itna paisa daale hain aur ek rupya ka kuch benefit nahi mil raha hai.
Executive: Benefit to aap lenge tab uthega na sir aap buyer se baat kariye aapko jo message aa raha hai call aa raha hai 27 27 26 26 call unse utha ke baat kariye. Deal to banegi aapki jab aap karenge.
Customer: Ab buyer se baat kare kaise? Hum koi company ka dealer nahi hai local hum kisi dealer se maal le rahe hain bech rahe hain. Hmm hmm. Aur wo rate aur jo dealer matlab jo buyer mil raha hai humko uska rate aur mera rate jo pad raha hai usme antar aa raha hai na hum nahi de pa rahe hain us rate mein.
Executive: Hmm sir to wo thik hai sir to aap apne dealer se baat karenge na jo product wo maang raha hai wo to aapka kaam hai phir.
Executive: Jaise agar humne aapko buyer de diya. Hai na Karamveer ji?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Usko product dena to aapka kaam hai na phir.
Executive: Haan bataye.
Customer: Mera location jo hai wo to Ranchi ka diya hai na.
Executive: Bilkul.
Customer: Aur Ranchi se hum 150 kilometer dur gaon mein rahte hain. Mera dukaan bhi gaon se hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aap jo hai yaha se ab Ranchi jyadatar jo hai Ranchi area ka apne paas buyer mil raha hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Ranchi area ka buyer mil raha hai us vyakti ko yaha se ab kisi ko 100 bag chahiye koi cement. Ab yaha se hum 100 bag ke liye waha bhejenge to uska labor of cost jo hai uska jyada pad ja raha hai. Hmm. To customer nahi le raha hai usse kam mein to wahi mil ja raha hai Ranchi mein maal.
Executive: To aap apne aas paas mein dekhiye phir buyer.
Customer: Apne aas paas to koi buyer aisa nahi mil raha hai na.
Executive: Kyun nahi sir jaise Kanke aapke kitni dur padta hoga aapke location se?
Customer: Kanke. Hmm. Kanke 140 kilometer.
Executive: Kanke to 40 kilometer hai. Haan.
Executive: Aur proper Ranchi aapko dur pad rahi hai. Ji.
Executive: Aapne GST Ranchi ki lagai hai sir aur aap hain gaon mein aapko deal karna hai kahaan aapko Ranchi ka hi buyer milega. Lucky siray kahaan hai sir apna?
Customer: Mera Simdega jila ka GST hai.
Executive: Haanji?
Executive: Simdega jila ka GST hai.
Executive: Thik hai sir hum ek baar aap upar baat karte hain phir aapko batate hain thik hai.
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund due to inability to supply.

- Initially told buyer and supplier would be provided.

- Location is far from Ranchi, affecting supply.



Resolution:

- Executive stated buyer is already being provided.

- Executive will discuss the issue with seniors.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after discussing the issue.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, location, supply, buyers
